statusMessage.error_decline: Something went wrong while declining your spot.

statusMessage.thank_you_accept: Thank you for accepting your spot! üòä

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.question1: I signed up for an event but I can't attend anymore, what should I do?
faq.answer1: Send us a message! Or wait for the automated confirmation email, where you can cancel and give your spot to someone else! If you already accepted then you can also just click on the Cancel button again, this automatically reassigns the spot! Please make sure to do this at least 24h before the event though, any later may result in being blacklisted for the next event!
faq.question2: The event I want to sign up for is full, can I buy my own ticket?
faq.answer2: Unfortunately no, there are some organizational issues, where we can not let our members buy their own tickets :(
faq.question3: Can I bring a +1 to the event? (possibly not from uni)
faq.answer3: Unfortunately, the program is only for first year AI and CS students from VU. We can't allow any plus ones. However, do reach out if there are some exceptional circumstances!
faq.question4: How do I sign up for an event?
faq.answer4: We send the signup links through our WhatsApp groups! Sign up through the Google Forms and wait for the automated emails to confirm your spot!
faq.question5: What will the next event be and when is it?
faq.answer5: We send out our calendars for each month through our WhatsApp channel! Also we post notifications on our Instagram page, if you're still not sure do not hesitate to reach out to us!
faq.question6: I got blacklisted, what can I do?
faq.answer6: Send us a message! If there has been a mistake, we will make sure to fix it. If you got blacklisted then it is probably due to signing up to an event and failing to show up without communicating this to us at least 24h before the event. We do this to ensure that people who would like to show up get that oppurtunity! Most of our events have more signups that we have spots and we'd like everyone that want to be able to attend!
faq.answer7: The Mentor Program is a supportive initiative designed for first-year students in AI or CS at VU. It offers free social events, study sessions, and exam preparations to help you transition smoothly into university life in Amsterdam, ensuring you thrive both academically and socially.
faq.question8: How do you join the Mentor Program?
faq.answer8: You can join the Mentor Program by following the provided WhatsApp link!

hero.title: Mentor Program for CS & AI
hero.subtitle: Aiming to bring first-year students together üòä
hero.text: Starting your first year in AI or CS? VU's Mentor Program is here to support your transition to university life in Amsterdam. Join you guys for free social events, study sessions, and exam preparations designed to help you thrive both academically and socially!

home_carousel.title: Franks Gallery
home_carousel.subtitle: Captured Memories
home_carousel.description: Find yourself in our events and see the amazing community we're building together. Every photo tells a story of connection, learning, and fun!

minigames.title: Minigames
minigames.brickBreaker_instruction: Move the paddle with mouse or finger; break all the tiles!
minigames.dodge_instruction: Move left/right. Survive as long as possible!
minigames.shooter_instructions: Move with mouse/finger. Click or press Space to shoot.

events.title: Past Events
events.subtitle: Take a look at the amazing events we've organized for you guys!
events.study_sessions_desc: Exam preparations and Study Sessions we did all year round!
events.mexican_dinner_desc: Delicious Mexican food and great company - what more could you want chico?
events.game_night_desc: An evening of fun games, and a strange monopoly game in the back...
events.guest_lectures_desc: Inspiring talks from industry professionals sharing their knowledge and experiences
events.halloween_club_desc: A spooky night out celebrating Halloween in style with a costume contest!
events.pumpkin_carving_desc: A creative evening of carving pumpkins and painting candles, alot of computer science artists showed up!
events.hackathon_desc: Intensive coding challenges in cpp to help CS students prepare for Computer Programming exam!
events.social_events_desc: Fun activities to build connections and create memories
events.no_images: No images available for this event yet.

errorPage.message: Something went wrong or someone didn't chop chop. If you have any changes of plans or want to cancel your spot in the event, please contact a mentor.
